project_descr: PAM is partnering with UNDP, IOM& ILO to improve the labor conditions. This prog aims to support PAM to develop internal capacity in reporting on its own performance, on labor movement & on compliance with int'l labor standards.

outputs.output_descr: PAM plans to improve the labour conditions and management system by analysing the demographic imbalance, making sound decision based on enhanced reporting mechanisms and upgrading its services quality for all economic and social actors.
